sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Header, Image, Menu, Segment, Sidebar, Grid, Container, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react' import './Dashboard.css' import Messages from './Messages' import Employees from './Employees' import Jobs from './Jobs' import Timecard from './Timecard' import Schedule from './Schedule' import Requests from './Requests' import CreateUser from './CreateUser' import DashSidebar from './DashSidebar' class Dashboard extends React.Component { state = { showMenu: false, view: null } componentDidMount() { this.setState({ showMenu: this.props.showMenu }) } handleDisplayChange = name => this.setState({ view: name, showMenu: false }) renderView = () => { switch (this.state.view) { case 'messages': return case 'employees': return case 'jobs': return case 'timecard': return case 'schedule': return case 'requests': return case 'createUser': return default: return } } render() { return (
{this.props.user.firstName}
{this.props.user.lastName}
 {this.renderView()}
) } } export default Dashboard
